In $ \triangle{ABC}$, we have $ AB=1$ and $ AC=2$. Side $ BC$ and the median from $ A$ to $ BC$ have the same length. What is $ BC$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac{1+\sqrt2}{2} \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ \frac{1+\sqrt3}{2} \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ \sqrt2 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ \frac{3}{2} \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ \sqrt3$
